items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.
items.title: AlphaIsYour/tokoeno: An experimental online marketplace simulation inspired by modern e-commerce platforms. Built with Next.js for a fast and dynamic frontend, and powered by Prisma with PostgreSQL for efficient database management. Currently a work-in-progress, aiming to replicate core marketplace features in a lightweight and fun way.

items.content_html: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Features include a dynamic product slider, Instagram-style stories, and a fixed bottom navigation for a native-like experience. Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind – no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.
items.title: kamran1381/PWA-shop-: A lightweight, mobile-first Progressive Web App built with Vanilla JavaScript and Tailwind CSS. Features include a dynamic product slider, Instagram-style stories, and a fixed bottom navigation for a native-like experience. Designed with performance and smooth UX in mind – no frameworks, just clean modular code and PWA optimization.

items.content_html: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.
items.title: DanyRolero/Quizify: Self-Assessment Quiz App is a lightweight web application that converts JSON data into interactive quizzes. With a simple interface built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, users can easily select different question sets and test their knowledge in real time.
